assertion: Whenever I eat beans-on-toast, I always imagine I'm a rescue helicopter and with every forkful I'm airlifting tiny bald men on a raft to safety.
A little chimpanzee once came to my house for tea.
Every Sunday I spend four hours planning the 20 outfits I'll wear the coming week.
Because my mum deemed Scooby-Doo too scary to watch, I was only ever allowed to listen to it.
Together, pranked their neighbour by added an item of clothing to his washing line after he put his laundry out.
They competed to eat the most ants to impress a boy.
When I was seven, I had to be a bridesmaid at my auntie's wedding, as one of the girls who was supposed to do it was ill and the dress was a perfect fit.
